definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: dainty (food), delight only pl.;—[[מַעֲדַגֵּי מֶלָךְ]] Ge 49:20 royal dainties; [[הָאׂכְלִים לְמַעֲדַנִּים]] La 4:5 those who ate (acc. to dainties) daintily; more gen. [[וְיִתֵּן]] [[מַעֲדַנִּים לְנַפְשְֶָׁ]] Pr 29:17 he shall give delight to thy soul (‖[[וִינִידְֶָ]]).—[[מַעֲדַנּוֹת]] v. p. 588, also sub [[ענד]]. p. 772
